com.akamon.api.client.service

Class ServiceConfigManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.akamon.api.client.service.ServiceConfigManager

  • public class ServiceConfigManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to manage loading the service config data. Important: you must call to registerConfigDir() at the beggining of your application
    Author:
    Miguel Angel Garcia
